function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption of food supply chains in cities due to transportation restrictions and border closures induced by COVID-19","Impact":"Potential food shortages and increased reliance on local food production","Mitigation":"Improving local food supply chain resilience and implementing alternative transportation strategies","Technologies":"Smart logistics and supply chain management systems","People":"City residents and consumers","Owner":"Local governments and urban planners"},{"Description":"Decline in tax base of many cities due to the pandemic","Impact":"Reduced ability to implement urban development plans and prioritize investments","Mitigation":"Developing alternative revenue sources and implementing cost-saving measures","Technologies":"Smart city financial management systems","People":"City governments and urban planners","Owner":"City governments and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Potential for ineffective response actions and economic losses in cities","Impact":"Inadequate stimulus plans and tax deferral effectiveness leading to prolonged economic instability","Mitigation":"Implementing evidence-based economic stimulus plans and monitoring effectiveness of response actions","Technologies":"Data analytics for economic impact assessment","People":"Economic policymakers and city officials","Owner":"Policy and decision-making authorities"}]}
